author: RTÉ Lifestyle
title: #ShineYourLight gallery: Photos from the special night
description: Light is a source of warmth, hope and vision. In a time of darkness, it can be hard to see. #ShineYourLight #LonraighdoSholas
content:
Light is a source of warmth, hope, and vision. In a time of darkness, it can be hard to see. 
President Michael D. Higgins has led the Irish at home and abroad to take part in the #ShineYourLight initiative - bringing light into darkness in a gesture of glob… [+6364 chars]
